properties.text: Datalist for Textbox behaviour by Gregory Georges
Extract Image behaviour by JP Deblonde
Push Out Solid behaviour by rexrainbow
Comment plugin by Francesco Iafulli (aka fiaful)
BetterAudio behaviour by Scirra (edited by XYZT)
Sonic sprites from Sonic 3 Complete by Tiddles, Neo, That One Jig, flamewing and others
A lot of graphics from various versions of Sonic Worlds by SFGHQ
Menu Sonic icon by DniweTamp, other icons from IconsDB and Icons8
Level music is le_forque.mod by marvin of skarla

Pieces of code from PixelMonkey, SamNight, 360є Engine by Damizean, Sonic Worlds by SFGHQ, Sonic Physics Guide by Sonic Retro, Jase00, Sonic Open Construct by IsraelTarssyus, Cosmic Framework by EsferaCelestial
Special thanks to Ayleen-Seraph, DniweTamp, HolatRoom server, HedgeLand server, Cosmic Framework server, Scirra forums
Thanks to Danik for his help with sprites, bug finding and testing
All the official Sonic stuff is by Sonic Team and SEGA
Danik_animation Help with sprites, ideas and testing
ZaP-65, Leosa002, JustJax Help with ideas and testing
TheLightXen Helped with the creation of the repository
thank you for reading up to this moment!
thanks to taiky for the code, as well as for testing
